title: Exquisite Kundan and Emerald Floral Haaram
materials: 22K Gold with Kundan Setting. Features carefully selected emeralds with vivid green color and a stunning rose quartz centerpiece. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster and exquisite finish.
features: This Haaram features intricate Kundan work throughout. The design incorporates floral motifs and elegant paisley shapes, showcasing the artistry of traditional Indian craftsmanship. The centerpiece highlights a magnificent rose quartz, surrounded by vibrant emeralds. The necklace showcases a fusion of traditional and contemporary design, rendering it a versatile piece.
colors: Primarily gold with brilliant white Kundan stones
accented by the rich green of the emeralds and the soft pink of the rose quartz.
occasions: and other special occasions. Ideal for brides who appreciate timeless elegance. Suitable for traditional events like muhurtham or seemantham ceremonies
as well as sophisticated modern gatherings.
description: This Kundan Haaram is a masterpiece of craftsmanship, blending traditional design with modern elegance. The exceptional quality of the emeralds and the mesmerizing rose quartz creates a unique focal point. The intricate Kundan work demonstrates the rich heritage of Indian jewelry making, ensuring you wear a piece of art.
